api_list.name: /player/auth
api_list.description: Get a player authetication token. This token can be used to generate a QR code to login to the player's account or to be used in endpoints that require authentication (soon). You must provide your Ronin wallet private key in the request body.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://axie-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com/player/auth"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "axie-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://axie-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com/player/auth"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "axie-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
